modName: Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles
summary: Nudes for males. New meshes, feet and hands improved (Beast races supported). Skin cleaned and realistic (Hairy Options). Better and younger faces. Long and beautiful hairs for males.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=994704BetterMales.png][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/994704BetterMales.png[/img][/url]


Nudes for males. New meshes, feet and hands improved (Beast races supported). Skin cleaned and realistic (Hairy Options). Better and younger faces. Long and beautiful hairs for males.




==> Look at the pictures in my gallery to see the improvements and options <==


[color=Red][b]I give my permission to use my work and my files, I do not have the time at the moment to improve it and continue.[/b][/color]




[color=Yellow]About...[/color]

Armor revealing :
- Most armor revealing found on nexus are compatible with the SundraconMeshes version.
- For FavoredSoulMeshes version, only the armor of Aoki are compatible. You\'ll find them at: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7865 

Big size for the \"erect version\":
I have not managed to make a smaller mesh size for the version of FavoredSoul, otherwise we see the hole in the body, the location of the penis, when the character jumps or moves.

\"Erect version\" for SundraconMeshes :
I tried but it proved difficult and as I did not have time right now, I abandoned for the moment.
If someone wants to do, he is free to try.




[color=Red]/!\\ Warning :[/color]

1] Choose one \"Nudes\" (or one \"Underwear\" if you prefer) and one \"Faces\", not to combine several.

2] The installation of options is manual, they are included in the main file (\"Nudes\" or \"Underwear\"). Install the main file, then copy the folder (Data, Texture or Meshes) of the option you want and paste it into your Skyrim directory (C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim). Overwrite existing files.

3] The mods that change the faces of the NPC can cause bugs with this mod.

4] Bodybuider version may cause some clippings with some armor, it\'s normal and I can not do anything about it.

5] If you use official HD patch :

=> Modify two files :

skyrim_default.ini (in skyrim folder) 
skyrim.ini (Documents/My Games/Skyrim folder) 
------------------------------------------------------ 
Before 
[Archive] 
sResourceArchiveList=Skyrim - Misc.bsa, Skyrim - Shaders.bsa, Skyrim - Textures.bsa, Skyrim - Interface.bsa, Skyrim - Animations.bsa, Skyrim - Meshes.bsa, Skyrim - Sounds.bsa
 sResourceArchiveList2=Skyrim - Voices.bsa, Skyrim - VoicesExtra.bsa 

After 
[Archive] 
sResourceArchiveList=Skyrim - Misc.bsa, Skyrim - Shaders.bsa, Skyrim - Textures.bsa, Skyrim - Interface.bsa, Skyrim - Animations.bsa, Skyrim - Meshes.bsa, Skyrim - Sounds.bsa, HighResTexturePack01.bsa, HighResTexturePack02.bsa
 sResourceArchiveList2=Skyrim - Voices.bsa, Skyrim - VoicesExtra.bsa 
----------------------------------------------------- 
Just add the sentence -> HighResTexturePack01.bsa, HighResTexturePack02.bsa
Make extra sure you have commas after all the file names, or Skyrim will crash.

=> Mods to uncheck (Don\'t worry, they\'ll still work in game)
- Start skyrim 
- Go to main menu - data files - uncheck two HighResTexturePack mod




[color=Yellow]The mod (SundraconMeshes version) appears in theses videos :[/color]

[youtube]NzSLjXVwOoc[/youtube]

[youtube]17CGb7VYOYQ[/youtube]


 

[color=Yellow]Details :[/color]

- BetterMales - BodiesNudes - FavoredSoulMeshes - FlaccidVersion :
Body, penis and feet meshes by FavoredSoul / Body texture by Chris57, improved by FavoredSoul / Lips, dirty faces and scars Improved by Xenius / Bodybuilder by TS, edit by Chris57 / Uncircumcised penis by Sundracon, adapted by Chris57

- BetterMales - BodiesNudes - FavoredSoulMeshes - Erect version :
Body and feet meshes by FavoredSoul / Erect penis by 4uDIK, edit by Chris57 / Body texture by Chris57, improved by FavoredSoul / Lips, dirty faces and scars Improved by Xenius / Bodybuilder by TS, edit by Chris57

- BetterMales - BodiesNudes - SundraconMeshes - FlaccidVersion :
Body and penis meshes by Sundracon, feet by FavoredSoul / Body texture by Chris57, improved by FavoredSoul / Lips, dirty faces and scars Improved by Xenius / Bodybuilder by TS, edit by Chris57 / Vein Removal by MadCat221, edit by Chris57 / Fat males by Thegal, edit by Chris57




[color=Yellow]Changes and improvements :[/color]

V1.7 : Beast races added and mesh adjusted by Sundracon + texture male refined (separation hand/body fixed, better faces and more..) + Add an option if you want uncut version.
V1.7.2 : Texture face and body refined.
V1.7.3 : Nose YoungerFaces refined, the resolution is greater.
V1.8 : Seam Elimination for Better Males by FavoredSoul. A big thank for you !
V1.8.3 : Add an option if you want hairy version. Improved YougerFacesMergedWithGeonoxFaces (beard less pronounced, less pronounced traits, and more...)
V1.9.1 : Improved textures and uv textures. Added an option : Smooth and muscular body.
V1.9.2 : Protruding nipples, penis texture for bigger version fixed
V1.9.3 Texture uv saved in RGB 8.8.8 : Stops Blocky Faces and Blocky Bodies from happening. 
V2.0 : New meshes, textures improved.
V2.1 : body afflicted added. The beautiful feet of FavoredSoul are incorporated into the version SundraconMeshes (+Textures improved).
V2.2 : add a bodybuilder version for the two versions, and a bigger penis for the favoredsoul meshes.
V2.2.2 :  uncut penis textures and hair body textures fixed for the sundraconmeshes version.
V2.2.3 : feet of hair body textures fixed (sundraconmeshes version). Hair body textures added for underwear version.
V2.2.4 : add Fat Males Option (no compatible with Several Sizes Of Penis and Hair Body Textures) 
 and Dirty Texture for SundraconMeshes version. And I added Dirty Texture for FavoredSoulMeshes version.
V2.2.5 : Bodybuilder version improved (3 choices).
V2.2.6 : Bigger Penis fixed for FavoredSoulMeshes version. Vein Removal added for SundraconMeshes version.
V2.2.7 :  add lips, dirty faces and scars Improved by Xenius.
V2.2.8 : add uncircumcised penis option for FavoredSoulMeshes version.
V2.2.9 : add a new file : \"BetterMales - BodiesNudes - FavoredSoulMeshes - ErectVersion\". Body Hair Textures Option added for Uncircumcised Version of FavoredSoulMeshes.
V2.3 : Reduction of files names and subfolders.
V2.3.1 : Uncut penis textures fixed for FavoredSoulMeshes version. Body Hair 3 fixed for FavoredSoulMeshes ErectVersion. Vein removal added for Underwear versions.
V2.3.2 : Reduction of files names and subfolders for Underwear versions. Bodybuilder version improved for underwear versions. Forsworn boots deleted for FavoredSoulMeshes version.
 



[color=Yellow]Mods without which nothing would be possible :[/color]

Nude Male by Sundracon : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3421
Nude Males v0_4 by thegal : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1947
No more blocky faces by xenius : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=30
Coolsims Hair Pack by newermind43 : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3809
Coolsims Retexture by Bloodysunday : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4400
Beautiful girl like Lightning from FFXIII not Mask by FrankSunday : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4423
My Type of Hair by Meister falls off cliff : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6173
MTOH Soyas hair Standalone by Meister falls off cliff : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7400
High Res Face Maps for Men by Geonox : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4141
Coverkhajiits by mrLenski : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5941
More Muscular Men texture normals by tigersan-wolverinehowlett : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4145
Bodyhair Nude Male HD by MysticBinary82 : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=265
BeautifulHair for females : http://dl.dbank.com/c01b7ynt1z
A Better body scale for Khajit and Argonian Male by TS : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6239
Male Body Vein Removal by MadCat221 : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3677
XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement by Xenius : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356
4uDIKs Real body -4RB- by 4uDIK : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6667




I am French, I\'m sorry if I express myself badly.
Good game to you!

(Pour les fran√ßais, contactez-moi par mp si vous avez besoin d\'explication sur le mod)
